originalText.text: Avi and Aaron are rockstars!!!! I damaged my car badly. They worked with my insurance company, fixed everything perfectly and went above and beyond - even cleaned and detailed my car and fixed extra things like my low tire pressure. This auto body shop is a CLASS ACT! Amazing service, professional, will get job done with 110% effort and great humans. Thank you so much guys!!!

text.text: Avi and Aaron are rockstars!!!! I damaged my car badly. This auto body shop is a CLASS ACT! Amazing service, professional, will get job done with 110% effort and great humans. Thank you so much guys!!!

originalText.text: Originally paid $37 for emissions and complete inspection. Failed for two items. Was informed by original inspecting garage follow-up inspection would be $10.00, and would cover only items required to be re-inspected. I called the DMV prior to my visit to Raz Auto, to confirm this, and DMV informed me this was in fact the fee for which I would be responsible. DMV also provided me with the official State schedule of payments, which again confirmed I would only have to pay $10. When I explained this to the mechanic/proprietor of Raz auto, he ignored me and stated the fee would be $37.00. I reminded him the DMV had an official schedule of fees, and he replied “I set the prices, not the DMV.” This latter statement is also untrue and a violation of his duties as a state inspection site. I reported the business to the city. Regardless of this business’s reviews (and I have found far better prices in the past, mere blocks away), I urge you to avoid them for their poor ethics. Paramount to a relationship with any auto mechanic is trust you will not be arbitrarily overcharged

originalText.text: Car was running really poor, granted it was 12 years old, but after a tune up and engine cleaning the car is running like new, noise is gone and I can get much more needed miles in this  car market. Would definitely come back

originalText.text: Steer clear. Went for routine inspection and was lied to in an attempt to get me to leave or get unnecessary car upgrades. Really upsetting experience. Glad I got out of there and to a reputable dealership service center.

text.text: Steer clear. Went for routine inspection and was lied to in an attempt to get me to leave or get unnecessary car upgrades. Really upsetting experience. Glad I got out of there and to a reputable dealership service center.

originalText.text: I needed some collision work done to my Dodge Challenger & Raz Auto Services was there for me every step of the way! Many thanks to Avi & Ophir for handling my repair courteously & finishing it ahead of time!  Avi & Ophir are completely honest & are truly a pleasure to work with! Cannot recommend this establishment highly enough!
